<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 7</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +21, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Mercantile Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (3), [keys to manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)_, average [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) (marked with the symbol of the Scarlet Triad), spellbook, [infiltrator's thieves tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 155

**Timely Distraction** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature Heuberk can see within his melee reach misses him with a melee Strike. **Effect** Heuberk attempts to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) the creature. If it's not Heuberk's turn and he gets a success, the effect applies on his next turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mace_ +19 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 piercing

**Occult Prepared Spells** DC 27, attack +19
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157)
- **4th**
[Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125)
- **5th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57)

**Identify an Opening** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) **Requirements** A creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against Heuberk's next melee attack. **Effect** Heuberk points out a lapse in the creature's defenses. The creature is flat-footed against all melee attacks attempted by any of Heuberk's allies who hear and understand this instruction until the start of Heuberk's next turn.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   2d6

</column>
